attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make your voice heard, together we can make a difference!
Adopting new policies seems fundamental to avoid the 2ºC threshold that would result in severe environmental catastrophes. Therefore, we say YES to the use of renewable energy and promote its implementation in overseas projects through our Human and Habitat Campaign.
Sign our petition to persuade Prime Minister Gordon Brown to increase the widespread usage of clean renewable energy in the UK, and lead the way in combating climate change. 
Don’t wait any longer. Help us to encourage the government to take action and decrease national carbon emissions.
